# ellipsoidalAltitude

**Instance Property**

The altitude as a height above the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84) ellipsoid, measured in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
var ellipsoidalAltitude: CLLocationDistance { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/ellipsoidalAltitude] property represents the altitude above the WGS84 ellipsoid associated with a location. Use the [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/ellipsoidalAltitude] property when your geodetic application needs an altitude with respect to a standard reference frame. Use [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/altitude] if your application needs an altitude with respect to the approximate mean sea level.

The [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/ellipsoidalAltitude] value is valid if [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/verticalAccuracy] is greater than `0`, and invalid if [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/verticalAccuracy] is `0` or below. If [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/verticalAccuracy] is `0` or below, [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/ellipsoidalAltitude] is invalid and contains the value `0.0`.

Valid values for [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocation/ellipsoidalAltitude] can be positive or negative. Positive values indicate altitudes above the ellipsoid. Negative values indicate altitudes below the ellipsoid.

## Getting the location attributes

- **coordinate**: The geographical coordinate information.
- **altitude**: The altitude above mean sea level associated with a location, measured in meters.
- **CLLocationDistance**: A distance in meters from an existing location.
- **floor**: The logical floor of the building in which the user is located.
- **timestamp**: The time at which this location was determined.
- **sourceInformation**: Information about the source that provides the location.
